issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Add DELTA_LENGTH_BYTE_ARRAY
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13388](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13388). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While trying to read a utf8 column with DELTA_LENGTH_BYTE_ARRAY encoding, pyarrow yields

`OSError: Not yet implemented: Unsupported encoding.`

It would be nice to have support for this encoding, since it lends itself really well to the arrow format, whereby values's encoding is equal to arrow's representation.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13388?focusedCommentId=17559491) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13386
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13386>
